title: Why are bakers' fortunes on the rise?
description: What is helping purveyors of bread and cake bake back better?

title: Tory leadership contest: Under-18s who get to pick the next PM

title: Cost of living: Help is coming, says Kwasi Kwarteng
description: Kwasi Kwarteng, an ally of Tory leadership candidate Liz Truss, says the Treasury is "working on options".

title: Inside Amapiano, the new sound of South Africa
description: In Zulu, Amapiano literally means “the pianos” and it's a blend of house, kwaito, jazz, and lounge music.

title: 'I broke the world record with my last ever run'
description: Kate Jayden, from Derbyshire, finished her final run on 15 April, despite suffering a broken knee.

title: Demi Lovato is back, and this time she's angry

title: Pondoland: South Africa's cannabis growers left behind by legalisation plans

title: Greece promotes smaller islands over Mykonos and Corfu

title: Jurgen Klopp: Liverpool should get points if Manchester United game postponed over protests
description: Jurgen Klopp believes Liverpool should be awarded the points if their Premier League match against Manchester United is postponed over fan protests.

title: European Championships 2022: Keely Hodgkinson claims 800m gold
description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson wins her first major outdoor title as she claims gold in the women's 800m at the European Championships.

title: Arsenal mentality shift 'crazy' - how far can Mikel Arteta's Gunners go?

description: Misuzulu ka Zwelithini takes the throne in spite of some relatives and royals launching legal challenges.

description: Some students have still not received their BTec results which were due out on Thursday.

description: Watch GB's Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix and Lois Toulson win gold in the women's synchronised 10m at the European Aquatics Championships.

title: Rail strikes: Passengers told not to travel by rail as disruption hits
description: Rail passengers face further disruption amid the sixth one-day strike of the summer.

title: Actor Stephen Tompkinson due in court charged with inflicting GBH
description: The CPS says DCI Banks star Stephen Tompkinson, who denies the charge, is due in court in September.

title: UK record after Welsh man shears 902 sheep in nine hours

title: Jonah Hill to stop promoting films to protect his mental health

title: Seized Russian superyacht to go under the hammer
description: The monster boat can sleep 12 guests and boasts a swimming pool, jacuzzi, spa and 3D cinema.

title: 250 rabbits to be given to activists as farm closes
description: Comedian Ricky Gervais is among those to have spoken out against T&S Rabbits.

title: UK drought: Why do the trees think it's autumn already?
